title: Q1 - How does DPDPA apply to employee data?
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) allows employers to process personal data for employment-related purposes under Section 7(i) — but this permission is not unlimited. Any monitoring or surveillance activity must still comply with the Act’s core principles of lawful purpose, necessity, and proportionality.
